parametrized_description: A manufacturer uses large and small planes to ship their cars. Each large plane can carry CapacityLarge cars and each small plane can carry CapacitySmall cars. The number of large planes must be less than the number of small planes. The manufacturer wants to deliver at least MinCars cars. Find the minimum number of planes required.

CapacityLarge.description: Number of cars a large plane can carry

CapacitySmall.description: Number of cars a small plane can carry

MinCars.description: Minimum number of cars to deliver

NumLargePlanes.description: The number of large planes used

NumSmallPlanes.description: The number of small planes used

constraints.description: Each large plane can carry CapacityLarge cars and each small plane can carry CapacitySmall cars. The total number of cars shipped must be at least MinCars.
The number of large planes must be less than the number of small planes.

objective.description: The objective is to minimize the total number of planes required to deliver at least MinCars cars.
